info.title: Integromat API
info.description:
> The `scenario:*` and the `organization:*` scopes are currently private only. We're working on a new full-featured API for the general public. For mode updates, please follow [this thread](https://www.integromat.com/en/requests/new-app-requests/p/integromat-api).

# Authorization

Before you start using Integromat API, you need to obtain an API key. To do so, please navigate to [your profile settings](https://www.integromat.com/user#tab:api) in Integromat and choose tab named **API**. Then click **Add token** button.

![](https://blobscdn.gitbook.com/v0/b/gitbook-28427.appspot.com/o/assets%2F-LC12sgBWZWwjEbbd84M%2F-LNLnY1qvUESOEuLXw8C%2F-LNLoMebYeUfvGgiSqpo%2Fimage.png?alt=media&token=8df6b750-7098-49db-aa3f-ed688a9426a4)

A dialog will show up. You can set permissions for the newly generated API key.

![](https://blobscdn.gitbook.com/v0/b/gitbook-28427.appspot.com/o/assets%2F-LC12sgBWZWwjEbbd84M%2F-LNLnY1qvUESOEuLXw8C%2F-LNLoqnBFyfrYfyW5YCn%2Fimage.png?alt=media&token=4bf24ac0-ab52-40ac-8aec-7adc24b43ac6)

Then click the **Add** button. Your new API key will be generated and will be displayed in the **Tokens** section. Write the token down or copy it to you clipboard. This is the only time when you can see whole API key.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: Return scenarios where organization is equal to this value. Optional.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number. Must be higher or equal to 1, and the default is 1.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: A limit on the number of executions to be returned. Limit can range between 1 and 1000, and the default is 50.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Return results where the status is equal to this value. 1 = success, 2 = warning, 3 = error. Optional.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Return results where the date is greater than or equal to this value. ISO 8601 format. Optional.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Return results where the date is less than or equal to this value. ISO 8601 format. Optional.

schema.example:
# This is a test

- Fast
- Simple
- Powerful

This is a [link](https://www.integromat.com).

text/markdown.example:
# This is a test

- Fast
- Simple
- Powerful

This is a [link](https://www.integromat.com).

get.description: Gets a currently logged user info

Then click Add token button. A dialog will show up. You can set permissions for the newly generated API key. Then click the Add button. Your new API key will be generated and will be displayed in the Tokens section. Write the token down or copy it to you clipboard. This is the only time when you can see whole API key.
